data.message: how do I varify my fb account with blue mark?

replies.message: Hi Hridoy. If you see a blue badge on a Page or profile, it means that Facebook confirmed that this is the authentic Page or profile for this public figure, media company or brand. Keep in mind that not all public figures, celebrities and brands on Facebook have blue badges. You can find more information about Page verification, including eligibility requirements in our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2rqzVw3. -William
